casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. Maxim CIZURA, Relator-Appellant, v. Benjamin M. DAY, as Commissioner, etc., Respondent-Appellee. No. 270. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 17, 1931. Herman Berkowitz, of New York City, for appellant.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order [41 F. (2d) 861] affirmed in open court.
